name: flamenco_jondo
description: Where flamencos can share and learn about the most complex human idea

scripts.execute-schema-to-db: docker exec -it flamenco_jondo_db psql -U flamenco_jondo_user -d flamenco_jondo_db -f /schema.sql
scripts.restart-db: docker-compose down --volumes && docker-compose up -d && npm run dbml-to-sql && npm run copy-schema-to-db && npm run execute-schema-to-db
scripts.prisma-db-pull: cd common && npx prisma db pull
scripts.restart-and-update-prisma: npm run restart-db && npm run prisma-db-pull && npm run prisma-generate-types && npm run prisma-seed
scripts.start:dev: npm run restart-and-update-prisma  && npm run run:dev
